page.title: 16PROGRESS THROUGH THE YEARS
page.content: Mr Forbes,a retired mill worker was born in 1901 and has spent all his life in the{parish of Skene.} The families were a lot bigger when Mr Forbes was a boy,some families had as many as twelve children.There were quite a few changes on the estates. Lord Cowdray has owned the estate for 66 years and brought many{modern} {changes}to homes and villages.At the south side of the loch,Lady Cowdray had a temple built and also towers which are still standing today. The water from the loch of Skene was used to power a{cotton mill}but this was closed many years ago.Large Estate homes e.g.Skene house have been converted into flats. It is the opinion of Mr Forbes that all the changes over the years have been for the better.
